description.p1:
This applet computes children's future height, weight, and BMI. Based on a child's current age and physical measurements, this app uses a machine learning model to compute the children's future height, weight, and BMI for a specified number of years into the future.
Yasin, Y., Sun, Y.H., and Lee, K. (2022). A machine learning approach for predicting children's future BMI. Canadian Developmental Psychology Conference.
